perturbation.original_text: For purposes of this Section 1.1(b), (i) the “Market Price” of any Products & Services shall mean the price for such Products & Services established by Constellation as the competitive market price at which such Products & Services are to be made available to Constellation’s customers with a similar anticipated load profile within a specified utility service territory.
perturbation.changed_text: For purposes of this Section 1.1(b), (i) the “Market Price” of any Products & Services shall mean the price determined by Constellation at its sole discretion, irrespective of competitive market conditions or prices offered to other customers.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Market Price' refers to a 'competitive market price.' The modification allows Constellation to set the price without regard to market conditions or what other customers pay, thus deviating from the common understanding and potential legal definition of 'market price' as a fair and competitive rate.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring good faith and fair dealing, potentially violating anti-trust laws if the price is set to stifle competition.

perturbation.original_text: All Services included in the Products & Services shall be performed with at least the level of service, quality and care provided by Constellation to other third parties receiving the same or substantially similar services. Constellation will provide, or cause to be provided, all of the Services included in the Products & Services in compliance in all material respects with all applicable laws, rules, regulations, codes, orders, treaties and other requirements of federal/national, state/provincial and local governments and agencies thereof, including but not limited those relating to labor, health, safety and the environment.
perturbation.changed_text: All Services included in the Products & Services shall be performed according to Constellation's internal standards. Constellation will endeavor to provide the Services in a manner that generally aligns with applicable laws, rules, regulations, codes, orders, treaties and other requirements of federal/national, state/provincial and local governments and agencies thereof, including but not limited those relating to labor, health, safety and the environment.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause mandates compliance 'in all material respects' with all applicable laws. The modified clause weakens this to a general alignment, removing the strict requirement for compliance and introduces ambiguity. This is contradictory as it implies that full legal compliance may not always be guaranteed or prioritized.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Various environmental, labor, and safety laws which require strict compliance, not just general alignment.

perturbation.original_text: Each of the HOF Entities or Constellation may terminate this Agreement at any time without liability if association with another Party could, in such Party’s reasonable opinion, materially damage its reputation or image or in the event a Party breaches Section 3.3 hereof, which breach is not cured within sixty (60). days of receipt of notice of such breach.
perturbation.changed_text: Each of the HOF Entities or Constellation may terminate this Agreement at any time without liability if, in their sole discretion, they feel that maintaining the agreement is no longer in their best interest.
perturbation.explanation: The original termination clause is based on 'reasonable opinion' of potential reputational damage which is an objective measure. The modification allows termination based on a party's 'sole discretion' and 'best interest', removing the requirement for a reasonable basis. This deviates from the principles of good faith and fair dealing typically implied in contracts.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring good faith and fair dealing in exercising contractual rights; this could be seen as an 'illusory promise' if the discretion is unfettered.
